Valve's WW2 edition of Counter Strike, but unfortunately not even half as popular.
Its one of those simple, source engine based games that are all fun and good to play like Half Life or TF2.
But I suppose if your going to market the most abused historical period for FPSers, then it naturally gets lost in the dark which is a real shame.

um dos melhores jogos e mods que joguei na vida, me arrisco a dizer que DoD é até melhor que CS, com cenário da segunda grande guerra você pode jogar com os aliados ou nazistas ( na versão antiga e clássica você ainda podia jogar com os britânicos que tinham armas diferentes da dos aliados em mapas como flesh), o jogo tem um sistema de objetivos, você deve capturar territórios no meio do mapa ou explodir veículos dependendo do lado que você joga você deve defende los, os movimentos são livres, você pode correr, correr rápido, pular, abaixar e deitar no chão, o jogo tenta simular o realismo desde o primeiro jogo, quando você atira, a arma da um soco o que torna mais difícil e divertido, correr atirando ou pular atirando não é uma "técnica" eficaz nesse jogo e você pode ser pego por uma "LURDINHA", as MG's, podem ser apoiadas em muros, barricadas, janelas ou chao o que diminuí o soco da arma e a torna letal, é preciso trabalho de equipe de todos para obter a vitoria, é uma pena que o jogo não tenha tanta  atenção quanto cs tem, seria ótimo uma nova versão de DoD como cs:go, com gráficos atualizados, talvez a volta de mapas clássicos que foram retirados e mapas que permitiam jogar com os britânicos como era no primeiro, e um sistema de busca rápida para jogos casual e competitivo como os jogos atuais tem, os fans ficariam agradecidos, (claro pessoalmente falando, atualizar um timo jogo, porem sem armas coloridas, enfeitadas, mantendo sempre a dificuldade em atirar, afinal essa é a raiz de DoD, e o que torna o jogo diferente e perfeito).

 recomendo muito pra quem gosta de jogos da segunda guerra mundial.

Ну а если серьезно, игра - неплохая. Вариация режимов, много различных карт, множество серверов и полно игроков, классический движок сурс. Жаль что СССР нет. Ну да ладно, одной пропогандой меньше.

Конечно, надеялся на большее. Но это не мешает поставить большой палец вверх.

I've never played this game in its heyday, so I can't comment on whether it used to be good or not. However, in its current state of relative obscurity, I would not recommend this, especially to newcomers. People who are good at this game (presumably veterans) seem to be fairly rude and not very helpful; the elitism is strong with this community. There are more grenades than World at War. It feels kind of spray-and-pray-ish to me (although I am a novice so I'm probably wrong). The recoil is crazy on the guns, which I guess is more of a nitpick than anything, but it's annoying. I think the biggest problem is simply that it gets no love, which at this point it will probably never get, and that leaves it in this state of obscurity.

Если хотите постоянных перестрелок в атмосфере Второй мировой войны - это игра для вас. Небольшие размеры карт делают эту игру максимально динамической. Тут вам скучно не станет. Разные классы, предназначение, море карт и стратегий. Сколько не играл, я практически не видео неадекватов. Большинство пользователей этой игры - уже взрослые люди. По этому вы не будете испытывать дискомфорт. Если вы любите тематику Второй мировой войны то игра как раз для вас. Так же для этой игры существует множество модов, моделей игроков и оружия. Единственное что не нравится в этой игре это то, что нельзя пользоваться техников, ни танками, ни зенитками, ни даже обычными джипами. Звуковое оформление на высоте. Если играть в наушниках то можно получить дополнительное удовольствие от звук коновал и выстрелов где-то. Определённо одна из самых лучших игр о Второй мировой войне.
Рекомендую.

9.7/10

My first ever Steam and multiplayer game EVER! This game is very close to my heart, I love it so much! I remember back in the day when this was still regularly played, and I played Zombie mode all day and night. The game is kind of dead now, there's still a few servers, but the zombie days are over. If you like Counter Strike: Source then this should also interest you, as it kinda plays like that game. Back in they day the first thing that would cross my mind when I heard "Steam" was Day of Defeat because it was the only game I had. I love this game mostly because what it was to me. It still deserves credit, it's just not maybe as good as I make it out to be.

This game is one of the best FPS shooter games I've ever played because it's awesome and it's a freaking Valve game which has a few players nowadays for some reason, but it's still playable and fun of course. It has amazing graphics for a kinda old game, it makes you feel as if you are playing CS:GO which is very cool, it has a variety of classes for you to choose from, it's tons of fun and as I said earlier, it's a VALVE game!!!!! Whenever you find a chance, go and grab it because it's definitely worth it!!!
